Server¶

class server.FEWGProtocol(users={})¶

Websocket protocol for FEWG clients.

onConnect()¶

Overloaded connect function.

onHandshake(header)¶

Overloaded handshake function.

onMessage(raw_data)¶

Overloaded message function.

class server.FEWGServer(prop_path='server.properties')¶

Server class

onStop()¶

Clean up before the server stops.

start()¶

Start the server.

class server.FEWGServerFactory(proto, props)¶

Websocket factory for FEWG server.

isFull()¶

Determines if the number of clients has reached its limit. Client limit is a server property.

sendToAll(msg)¶

Send to all connected clients.

sendToClients(clientnames, msg)¶

Send to all specified logged in clients.
